data.text:
Fantastic stay at the Bodrium Hotel and Spa.  Room was comfortable and welcoming. There was even a personalized welcome message from the staff. Restaurant (both breakfast and Tyro ) were filled with fresh and flavourful options. 
The true star of this place is the Spa.  Wonderful treatments in a calm and relaxing  atmosphere. Dilek at the front desk made excellent suggestions  and made sure we were well taken care of during the stay. The ladies that did our hamman and massages were amazing. So patient and caring. Thank you Emi and Yani for the truly relaxing experience.  Do not miss out on this experience.
data.title: Relaxing hotel with amazing Spa.

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

First of all, we would like to thank you for your interest in our hotel. Thank you for sharing your evaluation with us regarding the time you spent in our hotel. As Bodrium Hotel & SPA team, we are very happy to be able to offer you a nice experience and make your stay enjoyable. These valuable feedback motivate us further and help us improve our service quality. We hope your loyalty to our brand will continue for many years and we hope to welcome you again soon...

data.text:
Really comfortable beds! Cosy room with a pool view.
Myself and my mother stayed here for 6 nights and one thing that was very clear was the cleanliness and staff are very helpful and friendly!
I visited the spa most days as the facilities were free except for treatments of course, the receptionist at the spa was so kind and friendly.
I hope I go back to bodrum just to visit this hotel again.
data.title: Loved this hotel!!

data.text:
We stayed in a room with a view and it was cleaned every day and throughout the hotel everywhere was very  clean.We met Kadir the first day and he introduced himself and was very helpful and checked in every day. The service from all the staff were very good. The pool area was great and fantastic sunbeds. We ate breakfadt and lunch at hotel every day and was good, we went to the Italian restaurant one night, food  was good but very quiet. The hotel is in the middle of Gumbet and Bordrum 20 minutes each way, ask for directions. We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend the hotel if coming to the area.
The staff were all helpful especially during breakfast and for drinks and food service
data.title: Great hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

First of all, we would like to thank you for your interest in our hotel. Knowing that you enjoyed your stay is a source of motivation for us. On behalf of our entire team, thank you for your sincere and kind comments. You should know that we are always pleased to welcome you. We will be happy to host you again in our hotel as soon as possible. 

Regards,
Tugce OZKELLE
Guest Relations Executive
owner_response.author: BODRIUM HOTEL

data.text:
Iâ€™d just like to say wow! I get massages in the UK quite frequently so I know a good massage & this was by far one of the best Iâ€™ve had, hand on heart.

If you travel to the Kumbahce area of Bodrum, I highly recommend you visit bodriums hotel spa.

We got an air b&b & found it super easy to call up & book for a hammam & massage, they also are easy to message on WhatsApp to reserve.

For brits who donâ€™t know, Hammam is like a full body scrub & soapy bubbles all over.
We didnâ€™t have to be guests.

With the treatment we got they give you half hour in the sauna & steam room (they also said we could come earlier for this)

Followed by half hour hammam & then 50 min massage. With the high quality of the scrub & massage however, it felt so much longer.

Very reasonable price, for this kind of treatment in the uk we would pay over double at a spa this nice.

We had Kadek & wayan who are both extremely professional & both outrageously good. Got so deep in spots I didnâ€™t know I had tension!

Also the manager dilek was so so accommodating. She talks you through the process in details, will provide you the best refreshmentsâ€¦ wait till you try the tea ðŸ˜‹
data.title: You Need to go to this spa if you travel to Kumbache
